## Facade type

\*

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Facade<G extends {
    [N in Extract<keyof G, string>]: () => CommonModule<N> | Promise<{
        default: CommonModule<N>;
    }>;
} = any> = {
    [K in Extract<keyof G, string>]: ModuleFacade<GetPromiseModule<ReturnType<G[K]>>>;
};
```
